infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Radiant Research's research facility houses Biotechnology platforms like Cell Biology, Molecular Biology, Microbiology, Biochemistry and well-designed animal house to offer a wide range of preclinical services.
infrastructure.salient-features.laborato: Well-equipped In vitro Cell biology, Molecular Biology and Microbiology laboratories.
infrastructure.salient-features.drug-tes: Well-equipped AYUSH certified Drug Testing Laboratory supported by separate microbiology lab, analytical facility.
infrastructure.salient-features.cosmetic: Standardized protocols for cosmetic testing with suitable equipment's to simulate the natural conditions.
infrastructure.salient-features.animal-h: Animal house as per CPCSEA standards with efficient AHU, separate breeding and experimentation areas with dedicated in-house biochemistry and histology facility.
infrastructure.salient-features.power-ba: Entire facility is backed up with UPS and DG power.
infrastructure.services.in-vitro-laborat: Well-equipped In vitro Cell biology, Molecular Biology and Microbiology laboratories.
Well-equipped AYUSH certified Drug Testing Laboratory supported by separate microbiology lab, analytical facility.
infrastructure.services.cosmetic-testing: Standardized protocols for cosmetic testing with suitable equipment's to simulate the natural conditions.
infrastructure.services.animal-house.des: Animal house as per CPCSEA standards with efficient AHU, separate breeding and experimentation areas with dedicated in-house biochemistry and histology facility.
infrastructure.services.power-backup.des: Entire facility is backed up with UPS and DG power.
careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Do You Have Passion For Performance?
careers.description: We are on a path to build the customer focused CRO. We are determined to meet our goals and we will have fun along the way. Looking to be part of Radiant Research family? We provide opportunities for personal growth, a collaborative and inclusive work environment and exceptional employee benefits. Be a part of the team where amazing things happen every day! Join us if you are looking for a career, not "just a job".
careers.hiring: Radiant research is constantly hiring for all positions. If you would like to explore career opportunities with us, please send your resume to bd
careers.cv.title: Drop your CV here
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Visit us at any of our office locations across India anytime. We're here to serve you with excellence and innovation. Our locations are designed to provide you with the best experience.
contact.form.title: Send us a Message
contact.form.validation.full-name-min: Full Name must be at least 2 characters
contact.form.validation.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
contact.form.validation.phone-invalid: Please enter a valid phone number
contact.form.validation.message-min: Message must be at least 10 characters
contact.form.success: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.

chatbot.pricing.microbiology-virology.de: Explore our Microbiology & Virology services for comprehensive research solutions.
chatbot.pricing.toxicity-study.descripti: Learn about our Toxicity Study services to ensure product safety and compliance.
chatbot.pricing.invitro-study.descriptio: Discover our Invitro Study capabilities for advanced cellular and molecular research.
services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional healthcare and research solutions
aboutus.overview.experience: With over 15 years of experience, our core strength lies in delivering customized research solutions with unwavering commitment to quality and integrity. We have successfully collaborated with esteemed partners in Korea, the USA, the Middle East, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan and European countries.
